title: Detect Magic
data:
{{Obsolete}}

'''Detect Magic''' was a level 1 [[Divinations]] spell which revealed details about nearby items, such as enchantment bonuses, [[ego]]s, and [[brand]]s. Higher [[spell power]] increased the odds of revealing useful information, as well as how many items were affected. [[Curse]]s were not revealed, however.

==History==
Detect Magic was removed in [[0.6]] with the removal of the Divinations school of magic.
